title: The Way That Knight Lives As A Lady - Novel Updates
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Couple Growth   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Knights   Nobles   Royalty   Sword Wielder   Transmigration
author: 성혜림
description: The sword of my closest friend and trusted adjutant pierced my body. When I opened my eyes again, I had become a noble lady of the enemy kingdom. In an unfamiliar and weak stranger’s body, three year’s time was lost, in which my homeland was brought to ruin. I was unable to come to my senses because of the pain of betrayal and confusion of my identity. However, eventually, I decided to live on as ‘Luciphella Aidine’, a noble who wields a sword.>
